author: Timothy Evans
title: Trump finally opens his war chest as he struggles to take down GOP governor Brian Kemp in Georgia

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Trump's First Major Midterm Donation Aims to Unseat Brian Kemp in Georgia

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Has Wide Lead over David Perdue in Governor's Primary

sentence: Former President George W. Bush is reported to be attending a fundraiser in support of Georgia governor Brian Kemp in another example of recent and longtime enemies of Donald Trump publicly rallying against the MAGA president's endorsed candidate, David Perdue.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Donald Trump's Enemies Flock to Brian Kemp in Bid to Thwart MAGA Surge

sentence: The latest example is Pence's decision to campaign Monday night in Georgia with the state's incumbent GOP governor, Brian Kemp, who faces a primary challenge Tuesday from former U.S. senator David Perdue.
author: Mariana Alfaro
title: On our radar: Pence appearing in Ga. as part of pushback against Trump-backed candidates for governor
Cheney and Pence take the fight to Trump, from Georgia to Wyoming
